nuff.PersonalizedBedrooms.RoomDesireDef.label: everything in room is poor quality or better
nuff.PersonalizedBedrooms.RoomDesireDef.description: If it has a quality, it had better not be awful.

nuff.PersonalizedBedrooms.RoomDesireDef.label: everything in room is normal quality or better
nuff.PersonalizedBedrooms.RoomDesireDef.description: If it has a quality, it has to be normal or better.

nuff.PersonalizedBedrooms.RoomDesireDef.label: everything in room is good quality or better
nuff.PersonalizedBedrooms.RoomDesireDef.description: If it has a quality, it has to be good or better.

nuff.PersonalizedBedrooms.RoomDesireDef.label: everything in room is excellent quality or better
nuff.PersonalizedBedrooms.RoomDesireDef.description: If it has a quality, it has to be excellent or better.

nuff.PersonalizedBedrooms.RoomDesireDef.label: everything in room is masterwork quality or better
nuff.PersonalizedBedrooms.RoomDesireDef.description: If it has a quality, it has to be masterwork or better.
